hb:RuleSetHist.hb:Revision: V1 : 2015-03-04 : Creation based on STD rule set V3 (2015-02-17) V1.1RC1 : 2015-07-16 : Update with examples, based on STD rule set V4 (2015-07-16) V1.1 : 2015-12-01 : Final release for handbook version 1.1 V2 : 2017-11-24 : Update with sonarqube replacing RuleDebt. Set of implemented rules to Active. V2.1 : 2020-05-07 : update implemented status for rules checked by software. Added parameter for the software. V2.2 : 2021-10-20 : add more implemented rules and new STD_08000.
